TEXT.TITLE: BENETTON IN FINANCIAL SERVICES JOINT VENTURE
TEXT.BODY: Benetton Group Spa [BTOM.MI] said it reached agreement with textiles concern [GFT-Gruppo Finanziario Tessile Spa] for a joint venture in the financial services sector. A Benetton spokeswoman said details of the accord would be outlined at a news conference on Thursday in Milan. The Italian clothing group has targeted financial services as a sector in which to expand its activities. In January, Benetton acquired a large minority stake in the Italian unit of the U.K. Financial services group Prudential Corp PLC [PRUL.L]. Reuter
